title: ThinkUp - Positive Affirmations, Daily Motivation
description:
The most popular iPhone app for Positive Affirmations and Motivation is available for Android!
What stops you from achieving goals or becoming who you want to be? Build your own self improvement program to develop the mindset and motivation you need to succeed, using personal affirmations in the most effective way.
Our mindsets and thoughts have enormous impact on our motivation, self-esteem, health, prosperity, and happiness. Positive self-talk is a simple and proven technique practiced by psychologists and life coaches to overcome challenges and achieve goals.
FIND INSPIRATION
Select affirmations from a professionally edited list or just use them as inspiration and create your own.
PERSONALIZE YOUR AFFIRMATIONS
Record in the voice your brain truly trusts and understands - your own
SET NOTIFICATIONS AND LISTEN DAILY
It takes time to change wrong patterns that are deeply embedded in us. Focusing on the same set of affirmations helps developing new, positive thoughts and reduces negative self-talk
ADD MUSIC
Inspiring music makes the experience enjoyable and relaxing.
1000+ AFFIRMATIONS FOR:
Daily Motivation
Better Sleep
Self-Esteem
Positivity and Positive Thinking
Stress Relief, Relaxation, and Calm
Bipolar Disorder Help
Health and Mental Health
Body Image
Weight Loss
Pregnancy and Parenting
Overcome Anxiety
Overcome Depression
New Career
Love & Relationships
Affirmations Meditation
Success
Self-Care
Spirituality
Gratitude
Happiness
Self-Love
Sports Motivation, Student Motivation
Commuting to work
Mindfulness
Walking Meditation
Morning routine
Stretching
Entrepreneurship, Creativity, Affirmations for Women, Kids, and Students, and many more affirmations recommended by the top personal growth gurus.
We're grateful to Joel Osteen for recommending the Pray and Daily Devotionals Affirmations!
Thank you, Hal Elrod, for your Miracle Morning Affirmations!
Thank you, all our users for the amazing affirmations you send us daily and contribute to our "Recommended by users Category".
FREE vs. PREMIUM
We offer a free access to hundreds of professionally edited affirmations as well as an option to create a sample recording in your own voice with four affirmations and one default music that all the users can record for a for life usage. For better results, we recommend upgrading to Premium and recording at least ten affirmations. Premium version also allows to change the background music and offers additional features to enhance your practice and achieve more.
The premium plans are:
* Monthly subscription for $2.99 (US dollars, please check the pricing in your local currency)
* For life access with a one time payment of $19.99
RECOMMENDATIONS AND SUCCESS STORIES
ThinkUp is recommended by top personal development specialists, business and life coaches, psychologists, and therapists. Please check www.thinkup.me for recommendations and reviews.
We encourage you to utilize what many already know; our mind is the key to a good, happy, and prosperous life. Finally! A wellness app that speaks to you... Literally.
BEST PRACTICE TIPS
- We recommend selecting at least 15 affirmations
- While recording your affirmations, mean it!
- Play your affirmations in a loop for 10 minutes, at least once a day before going to sleep. Morning practice is recommended as well for daily motivation boost
- Listen to the same set of affirmations for at least 21 days. Repetition makes all the difference
- Use headphones
- Watch this video for more details: www.youtube.com/watch?v=W0D5HD0U7p8
- Some great blogs and resources by our amazing community are availbale to learn about ThinkUp. Read more: http://thinkup.me/press/
- Think Up!
***ThinkUp needs access to:
* Photo/Media/Files - to use your favorite personal music
* Microphone - to allow recording affirmations in your voice
* Device ID & call information - to determine if there is an incoming call and automatically stop playing the recording
* In-app purchases
